    Modify doxygen config for code browsing

    Config values

    • PROJECT_NAME

    • OUTPUT_DIRECTORY

    • CREATE_SUBDIRS : NO => YES

    • EXTRACT_ALL : NO => YES

    • EXTRACT_PRIVATE : NO => YES

    • EXTRACT_STATIC : NO => YES

    • RECURSIVE : NO => YES

    • INLINE_SOURCES : NO => YES

    • REFERENCED_BY_RELATION : NO => YES

    • REFERENCES_RELATION : NO => YES
